attributes.action: Suspend all MP's salaries until Parliament reaches agreement to deliver Brexit
attributes.background: MP's from all parties have failed to deliver Brexit in accordance with the referendum result. The majority of MP's were elected in the last election on manifestos which specifically stated that they would deliver Brexit. The majority of MP's are frustrating Brexit hence should not be paid.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
